entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Lansdowne House
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:51 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -27.1°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 39. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 49 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 50 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
